name: get_news_everything
description: Search through millions of articles from over 80,000 large and small news sources and blogs.

q.description: Keywords or phrases to search for in the article title and body. The complete value for q must be URL-encoded. Max length: 500 chars.

searchIn.description: The fields to restrict your q search to.The possible options are title/description/content.Multiple options can be specified by separating them with a comma

sources.description: A comma-seperated string of identifiers (maximum 20) for the news sources or blogs you want headlines from.

domains.description: A comma-seperated string of domains (eg bbc.co.uk, techcrunch.com, engadget.com) to restrict the search to.

excludeDomains.description: A comma-seperated string of domains (eg bbc.co.uk, techcrunch.com, engadget.com) to restrict the search to.

from_date.description: A date and optional time for the oldest article allowed. This should be in ISO 8601 format (e.g. 2023-08-13 or 2023-08-13T05:32:40).

to_date.description: A date and optional time for the newest article allowed. This should be in ISO 8601 format (e.g. 2023-08-13 or 2023-08-13T05:32:40).

language.description: The 2-letter ISO-639-1 code of the language you want to get headlines for. Possible options: ar/de/en/es/fr/he/it/nl/no/pt/ru/sv/ud/zh.

sortBy.description: The order to sort the articles in. Possible options: relevancy, popularity, publishedAt.

pageSize.description: The number of results to return per page.Default: 2. Maximum: 100.

page.description: Use this to page through the results.

name: get_news_headlines
description: This tool provides live top and breaking headlines for a country, specific category in a country, single source, or multiple sources. You can also search with keywords. Articles are sorted by the earliest date published first.

country.description: The 2-letter ISO 3166-1 code of the country you want to get headlines for. Possible options: ae/ar/at/au/be/bg/br/ca/ch/cn/co/cu/cz/de/eg/fr/gb/gr/hk/hu/id/ie/il/in/it/jp/kr/lt/lv/ma/mx/my/ng/nl/no/nz/ph/pl/pt/ro/rs/ru/sa/se/sg/si/sk/th/tr/tw/ua/us/ve/za.

category.description: The category you want to get headlines for. Possible options: business/entertainment/general/health/science/sports/technology.

sources.description: A comma-seperated string of identifiers for the news sources or blogs you want headlines from.(eg bbc-news)

q.description: Keywords or a phrase to search for.

pageSize.description: The number of results to return per page.Default: 2. Maximum: 100.

page.description: Use this to page through the results.

name: get_news_headlines_sources
description: This tool returns the subset of news publishers that top headlines (/v2/top-headlines) are available from.

country.description: The 2-letter ISO 3166-1 code of the country you want to get headlines for. Possible options: ae/ar/at/au/be/bg/br/ca/ch/cn/co/cu/cz/de/eg/fr/gb/gr/hk/hu/id/ie/il/in/it/jp/kr/lt/lv/ma/mx/my/ng/nl/no/nz/ph/pl/pt/ro/rs/ru/sa/se/sg/si/sk/th/tr/tw/ua/us/ve/za.

category.description: The category you want to get headlines for. Possible options: business/entertainment/general/health/science/sports/technology.

language.description: The 2-letter ISO-639-1 code of the language you want to get headlines for. Possible options: ar/de/en/es/fr/he/it/nl/no/pt/ru/sv/ud/zh.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
